seo_guidelines: File names should follow the format: ai-agent-[agent-name]-[keyword].jpg (e.g., ai-agent-autogen-collaboration.jpg)
Use dashes instead of spaces in file names.
Keep file names concise and descriptive.
Use aggressive compression techniques to reduce file size (target under 200KB, ideally 100KB).
Optimize images for web use (sRGB color space, progressive JPEGs).
Maintain consistent visual style (color palette, font choices) across all images.
Use captions consistently to provide context and improve accessibility.
